parameters.text:
Hello, I'm Denis Khramov, visual and motion designer based in Seattle.

My journey started as a 3d architectural visualizer and then I jumped into the world of FUI (Fictional User Interfaces) which as a bridge to the product design world.

Currently I work at the Ford Motor Company as a product designer with focus on visual concepts, motion and prototyping HMI and user interfaces.

parameters.Title: Lincoln Nautilus 2024
parameters.Description: Design for Inspire theme for Lincoln Nautillus  & Navigator 2024. Done within Ford Motor Company.

parameters.functionScript:
if (!Inputs.activeQueryArray) return

Outputs['Matches Small Mobile'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Small Mobile')
Outputs['Matches Regular Mobile'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Regular Mobile')
Outputs['Matches Tablet'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Tablet')
Outputs['Matches Regular Desktop'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Regular Desktop')
Outputs['Matches Large Desktop'] = Inputs.activeQueryArray.includes('Large Desktop')
